page.title: 14Woodham Comprehensive School
page.content:
****************************
Woodham school is situated by Woodham Burn. It is quite a large school with very good facilities. These facilties include a running track, an all weather pitch, three tennis courts and an astro turf pitch for cricket. Inside the main building is a swimming pool, a gymnasium and a sports hall. There are about 1000 pupils at Woodham. The school is split up into four houses, Lambton, Raby, Durham and Branspeth. The school has a large hall with a stage. Next door to the hall is the Drama Hall which is used for drama lessons. The art department at Woodham is very good. There is a pottery room as well as two main art rooms. The area around the school is very pleasant with lots of trees and areas of grass.
